website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable hiking backpack with several extra features, making it an overall good value.
pros: Serves as a backpack and a cooler
Has 5 pocket areas with enough space for backpacking needs as well as your food cooling needs
Fits a good amount of food
Bottom section of the pack is the cooler
cons: Getting food out of this pack is not as convenient as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Not just for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Used my pack for the first time and love it! We took it on a beach trip - no more multiple bags and coolers this pack does it all! We easily fit 4 beach towels sunscreen phone and keys in the pack section. The cooler section was filled with a 6 pack of cans and about 4 water bottles! Sturdy design and lots of small storage compartments. Even comes with 2 refillable ice packs. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It looked like it would make my life easier
customer_reviews.text: I am bummed out about this backpack. It looked like it would make my life easier, I could carry my lunch and my necessities to work without having to carry a back pack and a lunch pack. I also wanted it for weekend hiking. I put my lunch into the bottom of the pack and zipped it shut. Halfway through zipping, the zipper broke. I hope it was just a rare defective pack, but since it is online only, I haven't been able to investigate it in person. I sent it back and had no issues with the return. I would like another one, but I'm skeptical about ordering it without testing it first.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. A little cumbersome maybe but I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for a trip to Hawaii in March. It worked great. A little cumbersome maybe but I used it as my personal bag on the flights and it fits well under the seat. Used it as a day/beach bag. The cooler portion works okay. Not the best & condensation/water leak through the material. Even with zippers completely closed. I'm using it for the second time and the material for the drawstring portion is completely coming apart at the seam. There is a two inch rip along the seam. I've been very gentle with it. It's frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Holly LeBaron

customer_reviews.title: Almost great.
customer_reviews.text: As can be seen in pics, there is plenty of space for various food items and a sizeable cold pack in the bottom “cooler” section. The top “bag” portion is a good size as well with one zippered internal pocket for organization. 3 star rating for durability due to fact that cooler section lining has begun to show some minor tearing from light use. Also, wish it had more structure in bottom portion for stability. All in all, a very good design with only a few lacking details.
customer_reviews.author: Corey M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag!!!! We took this bag this weekend four wheeling !!! We were able to keep all drinks cold and on the top half we kept all are clean clothes and sweatshirts when it got cold. It is one of the best investment I have made. We are going camping in a couple of weekend and excited to use it again. Also it got really muddy all I did was put it in the washing Machine and it came out like brand new. The fabric is so heavy duty !!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Needs better hardware
customer_reviews.text: Good thought process with this bag just needs sturdier materials. Unfortunately I had to return my due to the plastic hardware failing where the strap feeds through and adjusts. The bag is spacious and has a good, confortable straps and padding on the back. All of the pockets are pouch style (no mini organizers like in most standard bags and backpacks) which is a slight bummer. I typically avoid bags that dont have metal clasps and hardware but took a chance and was let down. If they put quality hardware on this bag, it would be five stars and easy to recommend to friends and family. Until then, tread carefully my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: The bag doesnt hold firm and sturdy to it’s shape when it is packed with items ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag doesnt hold firm and sturdy to it’s shape when it is packed with items like the display picture shows. It’s hangs really low when the cooler is packed, and the top bulges into your back and out the sides, it’s just not comfortable to hike with. Maybe to go on a short picnic, but lugging this around in the mountains is not the best idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this thing. You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack ever. Use it for overnight fishing trips and it holds 14 beers (cans) 1 water 1 soda can and an ice pack and a flask in the cooler. On the upper portion it holds all my necessities for an overnight bag. This thing is awesome and it's comfortable to carry. Best part of all is that no one knows its a cooler cause I blacked out the part that says cooler. Keeps the beer tab down 😎
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: We used this over the weekend when we went to watch the eclipse. We knew we would likely be fighting crowds and used it to pack drinks and snacks. It was great!! So much easier to carry than a traditional cooler! It has an insulated space at the bottom to keep things really cold and then a lighter area on the top to keep things cool. It also comes with 2 containers to fill with water and freeze to put in this section. We are very please with our purchase. Looking forward to taking it to some outdoor concerts and festivals in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: If it's a light backpack you seek, this is the one for you. I've had mine for about three weeks so I can't comment on the durability yet. If I had to guess, I would say it probably won't last long if you are a serious hiker. I used mine when I took a trip last week and stuff a couple of bottles of water in it along with some blue ice packs. The water stayed cold for about four hours so problem there. If you are the kind to pack heavy, I don't think this will hold up too long.
customer_reviews.author: Insight_full

customer_reviews.title: My new diaperbag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome backpack!!! So many different uses since it has the insulated portion on the bottom! This is such a great thing to have when you have little kids and need to carry snacks, milk, extra clothes, blankies, toys, etc. It has lots of compartments and little loops on the zippers to make it easier to open and close. It has breathable mesh on the back and the straps make it easier to carry. You can fit TONS in this backpack but it collapses down nicely! Perfect for overnight camping, sleepovers at grandma's, hiking with kids (or without), day trips to the fair or zoo, etc!
customer_reviews.author: icecreamlover48

customer_reviews.title: Best combo bag!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. We have used it on 2 different day trips to Disney World with zero issues. We used 2 lunch box size cooler shock ice packs and it kept our food for 4 people cold all day. Cooler is large enough for 4 drinks, 4 sandwiches, and some cheese stick snacks with room to spare. We can also fit everything else we need in the top portion(dry snacks, ponchos, medications, sunscreen, etc). We are very glad we found this combo bag!
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality bag but a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an all-in-one bag that I could take to work to include the things I need as well as for a few meals the day. It's very well made and it keeps my food and drinks cold, but I think there are a few design flaws. If you have some weight in the top half of the back, it's not real easy to pull things out of the cooler part at the bottom. You have to sit the bag upright, then fold the top part down to unzip the bottom part. But it's very roomy with lots of pockets. Does what I need to, and it should last quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barker

customer_reviews.title: My new beach backpack
customer_reviews.text: i got this backpack to take to the beach and very excited to test it out in the summer months. The backpack fits plenty of waters and snacks in the bottom insulated compartment. The top parts fits all the necessary items to take to the beach, like 2 towels and bathing suits. There are a few extra pockets for miscellaneous items like for your wallet, phone, keys and ect... Overall happy with this new backpack, its quality and size.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya  S

customer_reviews.title: Needs gentle touch
customer_reviews.text: Cooler zipper broke. Top pouch ripped when overstuffing it with a rain jacket. Having ge erous amount of items in top pouch makes it awkard to access cooler lunch boc underneath. Only way to do it is make sure top pull string is closed tight, lie entire bag on flat surface and open up. Opening, awkward, not too bad, closing the bag back is another story. Just annoying to use. But ill get my use out of it untill the 2nd zipper on cooler breaks. Would not recommend for anything rugged, hiking, camping, etc. Maybe in office setting where it can be treated gently.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Bags nice but 3 months later with light use it’s already ripping
customer_reviews.text: Update****(10/9/19) After posting my review I got an email from the company and they apologized for the defected item and offered to send me a new one. I really appreciate the great customer service. Bought this for work and 3 months later it’s ripping and coming apart I really enjoyed it while it was intact now I gotta look for another backpack cooler very disappointed would recommend anyone looking for a similar item to look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Buying This!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing! This the second time purchasing one for my boyfriend (the strap on the pervious one was ripped by a work tool but lasted him a year and a half), he uses it for work (he does tree service and landscaping) and it’s so durable and allows him to take cold drinks for those long days in the sun! My boyfriend use to go thru so many different backpacks because they couldn’t keep up or he would throw them around and they would rip but this backpack works wonders for him! Also comes in handy for going to trips to the beach, Disneyland, and hikes! Absolutely love this backpack for him!
customer_reviews.author: Jayy Solano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Sunday Afternoon Hike!
customer_reviews.text: While the backpack LOOKS intimidatingly big, it's not. The top section is actually probably slightly shorter than the main area of a regular backpack. This is to allow for space for the insulated pocket underneath. The insulated pocket is big enough for some snacks and a couple of sandwiches so its perfect for a Sunday afternoon hike. I'm only 5"2' and have had no issues with the size or weight of it and neither has my husband who is 5"11' - though I wouldn't use it to say, backpack across Europe.. ha!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Darelli-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I put a smaller ice pack at the top just to keep things cool, since i use a wagon the weight of ...
customer_reviews.text: Put a ice pack in the bottom at 11am - 8pm sat in 90degree heat watching son play football. I'm 5'7 and the back pack seem kinda too big for me BUT i was able to pack snacks at the top and beverages at the bottom. I put a smaller ice pack at the top just to keep things cool, since i use a wagon the weight of the backpack wasn't a factor... do consider the weight once you load this up. Still give it two thumbs up. :0)
customer_reviews.author: AG$

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected. Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for his new job on a mine site. It looks very well made and is much larger than expected, which is a good thing. The cooler part is huge and could probably fit a 12 pack of cans and still have room for snacks. The shoulder straps are well padded and the design just makes sense. I will update if anything goes wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Camper86

customer_reviews.title: Awesome River Bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag to take on trips to the river. I can put dry stuff in the top section and the bottom is the cooler part. Keeps things cold for many hours in the summer sun. The cooler can fit a six pack plus random snacks and a few ice packs. Comfortable straps and many pockets. seems well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: TO FLOPPY
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem with the backpack is that to unzipped the lower cooler section you to have to hold up the upper section to get the zipper straight to un zip it. Also the upper section has to much string to cinch it up and if you don't touch it in the pouch it's going to hag up on things when you walk If it was made more stiff it would have be better
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great bag overall
customer_reviews.text: I really wish their was more structure to the bottom lunchbox part. If you don't pack carefully you'll squish your food before you get to eat it. If there were more rigidness to the sides of the lunchbox I would no doubt give this bag 5 stars. Other than that I really enjoy the durability, function, and aesthetics of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: ginamarie

customer_reviews.title: really stupid design. Over priced
customer_reviews.text: The ice chest compartment is really small I thought the whole backpack was a cooler. You have to unzip the two sections from each other to use the ice chest.. really stupid design. Over priced. I bought this because one person asked the question "can this cooler fit a gallon of water + food + drinks" and people said YES... those people are dumb, you can barely fit a gallon of water in the cooler with absolutely no room for anything else, including ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!!!
customer_reviews.text: We live about an hour + away from family so we are driving a lot, I LOVE having this backpack that has a cooler! We like to bring drinks and food in the car for the drive. It’s so nice to have all of our things in one place instead of a big bulky cooler and separate bags etc. it does the job and it does it well! Can’t live without it anymore. Best road trip/traveling bag ever.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected and wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our Disney vacation and survived all the opening and pulling we did! Cooler didn’t leak or get damp. Can’t wait to use it for future trips. I fit 8 bottles, 4 Capri suns, 2 drinks for my husband, and some of our cold products for lunch. Lots of compartments that I utilized. I put diapers, snacks, wipes, extra clothes, and still had room left over in the top.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetLady

customer_reviews.title: it's the perfect size for an extra pair of clothes
customer_reviews.text: this backpack is the bees knees. I am a doula and actually use this when I go to births. it's the perfect size for an extra pair of clothes, random supplies, my breast pump and rebozo. I use the cooler to keep my drinks, coffee, and breast milk chilled while I'm away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Booker

customer_reviews.title: Works great,  durability stinks
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, worked great for 2 weeks and then the straps began to Fray... Lots of Room in the cooler my husband uses this for work and takes his lunch in the cooler part and his clothes in the upper compartment. Very disappointed in the durability
customer_reviews.author: Trisha L. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Best pack ever
customer_reviews.text: It works better then described. The cooler part is great. I live in FL and use this has a backpack/lunch bag. It keeps my drinks and food cold even when left in 90* weather. To keep it real cold I took my old lunch bag placed it inside this one giving it a double liner. Only draw back is the top section should be divided up..
customer_reviews.author: david n

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of the bag being how it is
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the bag being how it is.it would have been nice if the lunch bag part of the bag brought a topper to keep it sturdy or atleast to hold your lunch right.mine just kept crushing my lunch.also my bag broke at the top from the cheap thin material at the top of the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Sayda

customer_reviews.title: Many compartments and enough room.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find for our family. It is big enough for all seven of us to have snacks or lunch. My husband liked it the most because it is comfortable to carry and big enough to fit what he needed for a day out hiking. I am so pleased as this has been a great addition to our outdoor collection!
customer_reviews.author: Jemmydubloon

customer_reviews.title: Versatile bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It was actually bigger than I thought it would be, which is nice for packing extra stuff, but the top dry storage collapses when not needed. The only draw back seems to be the zipper tabs that pull out and have to be put back in. Otherwise a nice bag!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Tough Bag
customer_reviews.text: I put this item almost a year ago, I wasn’t expecting to much because of the price. This backpack has been MORE than I expected. I work at a major shipyard and this backpack is tough, keep my things cool and have ample storage. Great buy, coming from an actual consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Iboo

customer_reviews.title: If you want a cooler backpack - try something else.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love the design of this bag. The cooler section of the bag is not large enough to hold drinks for a day. Top “storage” section is spacious but if you forget to close it before opening cooler, you will dump everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Steber

customer_reviews.title: Cheap clips wanted to love this
customer_reviews.text: I just took this out of the box haven't even used it yet. Was trying it out on back and was going to try with waist support and the clip shattered. I haven't even used it yet, very bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Billett

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: It's great as advertised think of a sack style backpack over a medium sized lunch pale. holds everything you need a lot of small pockets on the outside. I use it for gym clothes and a lunch. The buckles are a bit weak tbh I stepped on one and it broke but I am 300 lbs so take that as you will
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Good for any outing
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is quite spacious. The bottom is insulated with enough room for 6 sodas and a couple sandwiches. The top has room for clothes or whatever else you want to put in there. A full sized laptop will fit in the top. There are several zippered pockets for smaller items. The straps and the back of the pack are padded for comfort. It is well constructed to take wear and tear. Good for any outing.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: If you’ll use it a lot it won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé to bring to work a year ago. After about a week the strings that are attatched to the zippers to make opening pockets easy started to break off. That was the only problem he had until recently when the top section ripped apart from the bottom section with the cooler. It was overall a great backpack and fit a lot of things, but if you’ll be using it a lot it won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: even if it was a poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, even if it was a poor design...I’m still the coolest person walking on the beach with my dog and another free hand to throw up peace signs due to this bag literally carrying everything for me. Beers✅ Swag✅ Towel✅
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Skerritt

customer_reviews.title: Great work pack!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I used to carry a lot of stuff with me switching from vehicle to vehicle as a landscaper and having a couple bags was a hassle. This was an awesome solution. Would be better with a hard side bottom but it works great as long as your not chucking it around. Lots of room for rain gear, socks, hoodie, some small tools, and plenty of room for lunch. Keeps lunch cool all day long with 2 medium sized ice packs or one pack and cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want to try it you’ll fall in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I walk everywhere and I do not go shopping without it I am glad I bought this bag it works wonderful and as long as your packet right nothing jobs in your back either I live about less than a mile from the grocery store and when I can’t get a ride it works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jo

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Room. And Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, typically a hiking backpack is used for healthy stuff right?? Hahaha anywho,..... the top portion could EASILY fit 2 FAMILY sized bag of chips, a thing of cookies, and candy bags/boxes too! The bottom cooler part also held 12 cans (soda, seltzer bubly, or any beverage of choice) and ice packs on the sides! Lol the bag had a comfortable fit. I'm super stoked for all the more adventures we will have with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: John R Tweed

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We found this backpack to be perfect. We use it to go to the car races, specifically Daytona. It holds the cold very well - our drinks were cold even at the end of the day. (It was very warm there.) The upper section was excellent for a few snack and our jackets. The straps are comfortable. All in all an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette K. Engel

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great!! Perfect for day hiking or a picnic
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great!! Perfect for day hiking or a picnic! Cooler on the bottom half for food and the top for whatever else you might need. Durable material and zippers work well. Lots of pockets for storage
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: backpack/cooler
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived as stated. Package was in good condition. Love this back pack/cooler!!! Much bigger than i was expecting. Cooler section is a very nice size. Am so very satified with this item. A 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: J A W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my fishing pack. I have my cooler below and fill the rest with tons of tackle. Very durable material and Tim's of compartments. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this item doesn’t work for me. I replaced the first one within the 30 day period as it was fraying. The replacement item did the same thing but I was unable to return. It may work well for someone in a different work environment, not mine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Keeps products cold and protected and is a decent size so it can fit wine bottles and such which make picnics that much better: ) I'm a taller person (female 5'10") and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for shorter hikes with less experienced people and have also used it for picnics. Keeps products cold and protected and is a decent size so it can fit wine bottles and such which make picnics that much better :) I'm a taller person (female 5'10") and it's easy and comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Stranzl

customer_reviews.title: Quality Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Cooler seemed to work great with a few ice packs inside. Hiked with this backpack in Yosemite and it worked very well. Stored our lunch in the bottom area that contains the cooler portion. Kept our sandwiches cool on a warm day.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is great for traveling especially when I'm carrying food
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great for traveling especially when I'm carrying food. It has a nice spacious cooler on the bottom portion of the backpack to hold drinks and sandwiches. There's pockets on the side and in the front which is great to hold little things.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Combo Pack
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Been using this for a week and it holds up for what it is intended for. Thinking about adding something to stabilize the bottom a bit, make it more flat and easy to store food items in without worrying about tipping; but definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the 4th of july. Worked well, have no need to use it often so I suspect it will last a long time. Although I take care not to put sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Justalady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family outtings!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is large and exactly what we need for family hikes and trips to the zoo and other outtings. Can be used to carry everything we need for our kids, snacks, drinks and I LOVE that it comes with a reusable ice pack! The waist belt makes is extra comfortable to carry too for added support.
customer_reviews.author: shophappy

customer_reviews.title: Zoo day!
customer_reviews.text: Great size cooler. We used it for a day at the zoo and it worked great!! Lots of compartments to keep things organized. The cold food was kept cold in the AZ heat of the day. (98) comfortable to wear. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Bkjmom3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag with a cooler in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag with a cooler in the bottom. Love the straps over the shoulders, across the chest and around the waist. I put it on the back of my trike and ride. We took it off downtown Chicago at Navy Pier and I strapped it on my back and we walked around without issue! Great bag, great price.
customer_reviews.author: D. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all day or 2 day hikes...
customer_reviews.text: Wow.... love this bag... Perfect for all day hiking and overnight... The cooler bottom fits 15 16.9 FL oz bottled waters. Fits very well and durable. Will be buying 2 more come spring...
customer_reviews.author: jl5150

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy and quite handy
customer_reviews.text: I work 16 hour shifts, I pack plenty in this bag and I’ve had several similar ones that have torn right off the bat. This is sturdy and quite handy. Only problem I have with it... it doesn’t keep its own shape. Nothing inside to keep the cooler or bag part open unless it’s fully packed
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Cleland

customer_reviews.title: Good pack
customer_reviews.text: Okay so it’s not lightweight but it keeps lunch cold out b day hikes or day car trips
customer_reviews.author: louise Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Works great for when we go fishing. Can bring beverages and snacks in the cooler section. Top is drawstring and holds a ton of stuff
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this replacement backpack in June 2019 and it has completely fallen apart in multiple locations. It’s now only October. The first backpack was used for several years until it was stolen. Not sure what the quality differences are as they are the same item. Serious quality control issues as it should last longer than 4 months. Unfortunately we are past the 90 warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely low quality.
customer_reviews.text: The back pack was what I needed it to be. The cooler did its job & there was plenty of space for what I needed to put in it. All I used it for was work. Unfortunately the backpack is EXTREMELY low quality. All I used it for was a lunch bag for work. I wasn't hiking or anything and everything is falling apart. Very poor stretching
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Morin Jr

customer_reviews.title: perfect for parents
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever!! going out and about or at the lake it is great to take extra clothes for the kids and snack! lots of space and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: The pack is comfortable to carry even for a short person
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is light weight and holds a lot! the top part has a pull tight closure and then the flap that connects it to the cooler part. There is also an inside compartment for smaller items. The pack is comfortable to carry even for a short person.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is the best purchase I’ve made in a long time when it ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is the best purchase I’ve made in a long time when it comes to backpacks . Not only is it good for the outback it’s good for just the hard working man or woman . I would recommend it to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Farley bass

customer_reviews.title: LOTS of storage
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for hiking! The bottom section can fit water bottles and food. The top part can fit clothes, blanket, small umbrella. I'm definitely going to use this for family hiking trips.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Quality was ok. Design is weird. The whole top has to be swung down to get to the cooler part.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I work as an EMT with Sacramento County and ride a motorcycle, I must say that this is an amazing backpack. I am able to take my 40oz Hydroflask, 2 meals in Pyrex Containers, and my surface pro. So far i am overly happy with this backpack. If this were to ever break on me, i would defiantly buy another one in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve conviced so many other to get this bag. It’s perfect for those of us who work long ours and have to eat on the go at work. Large enough to carry food for a day and keep the food at reasonable temps with the insulated bag. Love this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack/cooler for such a low price
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for the price. I use it for work. 12hr night shifts. Plenty of room for my food and anything else I need to make it through. On my second one. First once lasted 6 months or so. Not the most durable but for the price I'm fine with it. Also I treat it pretty rough so that's a factor. I reccomend putting cardboard or hard shell in the cooler part just to ensure you food doesn't get squished.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Montana III

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed and Plenty of Storage
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for keeping drinks and food cold. Plenty of non-insulated storage for other items. Well constructed. I use this every day for taking my lunch to work and on weekends as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle2

customer_reviews.title: Husbands work lunch box
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes this to work with him every day as his lunch box. He travels far so the straps come in handy. So far it’s held up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ally N

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this backpack but after two separate 4-6 hour hikes, the cooler ripped at the seam that attaches to the straps. With only a few liters of water for the 6 hour desert hike, I was very disappointed it broke mid hike(luckily at the return half). In addition, the back isn’t very breathable and will guarantee to be soaking wet with sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Had it several months and use it as a fishing backpack so it gets slammed around a lot. Plenty of storage in the top compartment to hold enough gear to do an overnight trip as well.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Big, bulky, shaped weird and tore near the cooler zipper within the first few days. The top half with the string falls everywhere no type of structure made me look very unprofessional. Low quality wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Can not recommend this bag highly enough
customer_reviews.text: Can not recommend this bag highly enough! We have 3 kids under 3 and needed a diaper bag for daycare that could House all of their spare outfits, 6 bottles, and 2 lunches. This little ditty came to the rescue!! Love the cooler compartment. We could fit 10 bottles easily if needed.
customer_reviews.author: MadeforMiles

customer_reviews.title: Large compartments!
customer_reviews.text: Just retuned form 10 day trip where we used this backpack every day on excursions. the pack held everything we needed for a day at the beach. and kept food and and beverages cool. Often had this pack fully loaded and it performed well.
customer_reviews.author: RandM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Uses it daily for work. Plenty of room for lunch, snacks and drinks on the bottom and her work supplies on top.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading. Go buy it .  Proof is in the pudding
customer_reviews.text: Best $40 I've spent in one place this year. Bag is incredibly roomy! Cooler keeps things wicked cold for long periods of time. Super comfy to carry. Planning a 15 mile hike. Will update after but love it so far
customer_reviews.author: JMelt

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my husband who works construction where you never know where lunch will be so was great to carry his lunch and food in the cooler and some tools up top. We also used it as a travel bag to locations we'd be hiking and it was great for that.
customer_reviews.author: melissaallison

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is for $40
customer_reviews.text: Picture is very misleading makes it look rugged with firm shape when it’s actually the complete opposite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. No leaks. Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. We had a bunch of ice in the cooler- no leaks. We put clothes in the top- no problems between the two sections. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a hiking back pack or a larger day trip / amusement park setup. It is fairly large for walking around so I'm returning it, but awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Cooler not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This worked great and 9 months until the insulation on the coolet ripped open. I was very gentle on it too. I only used it like 3 times too....Sucks because I really liked this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I fall in love with it more each day! Its tough as nails.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, get it! I use it for work. The top opening is large enough to hold my hard hat and more. It would easily hold a motorcycle helmet as well. The pack unzips in the middle to get access to the cooler. The top opening is the dry bag below that is the cooler with smaller pockets on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a lot of room for your things as well as your food in the cooler section. Good quality construction. The only improvement that I would make is to have some kind of insert in the cooler section to keep the back straight. But I love it.
customer_reviews.author: troublemaker

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler and backpack for my travels. It fits under airplane seats really well too which is nice. There are lots of pockets, and the straps help it sit pretty comfortably for carrying long distances. My only complaint is that it it really hard to open the cooler section when the backpack portion is full.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Coppinger

customer_reviews.title: Ripped fabric
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as described which I was quite pleased with. Unfortunately the fabric of the storage pouch ripped after being used just a couple times during the first day of it's use. Not sure if this was a defective product or not, but I was pretty disappointed about this since the rest of the pack seems to be of pretty decent quality. Will update after I use the replacement pack.
customer_reviews.author: Angelino V.

customer_reviews.title: I BOUGHT THIS ON JANUARY 23RD THIS YEAR, THE ...
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS ON JANUARY 23RD THIS YEAR, THE COOLER PART IS RIPPING APART FROM THE BACK PACK PART. THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dart.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after two months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this backpack for less than three months and the top isn’t already ripped. The description says 90 warranty but there is no way to access it. Overall very disappointed it would have been a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it " just wish it had more insulation
customer_reviews.text: Love it " just wish it had more insulation, oh and I replaced the square pivot zipper pulls with fishing lure split rings then replaced the string pulls to avoid derailing the zippers get one you'll love it ~
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect gift to have and to give to someone that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift to have and to give to someone that loves to spend time outside. Light weight, comfortable to use and it holds a lot. Very happy with this purchase! Happy Camper :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was super convenient that we could have beer in the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: We took this on a two day boating trip. It was just enough for our snacks, it was super convenient that we could have beer in the bottom cooler and snacks on the top. We look forward to beach trips with this baby!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - especially for my husband
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my husband to use as a diaper bag -- we love it -- it's more manly than the diaper bag I carry and it keeps baby foods cold!!
customer_reviews.author: MWLTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... than I expected but I guess that isn't a bad thing. My only complaint is that it didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I expected but I guess that isn't a bad thing. My only complaint is that it didn't come with the ice packs as it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini347

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable even fully packed
customer_reviews.text: Great bag bought it for our beach trip and it worked out fantastic for what we wanted only down side is you need to use cooler packs if you use regular ice dont bend down or lean forward the cooler is at waist level and you get a cold surprise right down your pants
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pleased with the pack as it met my needs. It felt a little cheaply made, but I have it a shot. After only a months use, the shoulder strap stitching failed and the pad started falling out.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small picnic or the beach
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small picnic or the beach. I have a grandchild, so this backpack has come in handy. I pack our lunch in the cooler, put our towels and a few toys in the dry section, sunscreen in the side pocket and my hands are free to hold my grandchild and a chair. I would purchase it again. It would make a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with my choice and highly recommend it as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the backpack as a Christmas gift for my husband. He absolutely loves it!! Where he works he has to carry a lunch everyday plus extra jacket or tools. So the combo of the cooler with the extra backpack space makes his life so much easier. He has repeatedly told me how much he loves it and how convenient everything is now. He loves how big and spacious the cooler part is and still has plenty of room to carry his extras. I'm so happy with my choice and highly recommend it as a gift for your man!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Denise Spray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made. Everytime I use it someone asks me where I got it from
customer_reviews.author: chase sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Raw vegan
customer_reviews.text: The best backpack I’ve ever owned! Awesome concept with wonderful results so far so good. I hope it keeps up with my active lifestyle. Being a raw vegan translates into me always traveling with fruits and veggie snacks not to mention freshly made juices and smoothies. This backpack helps to sustain my lifestyle and it feels great when you’re all zippered up and locked in.
customer_reviews.author: Vow of silence

product_meta.title: North Coyote Hiking Backpack Cooler Bag - Insulated Large Camping Back Pack for Men Women Travel Picnic & Lunch - For Fishing Hunting & Backpacking - With 2 Ice Coolers
product_meta.description:
Why settle for low quality cooler backpacks that aren’t well insulated, and use cheap materials that rip and break after a couple of weeks? 

 The North Coyote Cooler Backpack is made of only the highest quality, most durable materials, featuring a water resistant cooler compartment with heat-sealed seams and top-notch, effective foam insulation that keeps your food and drinks cold for hours on your next beach trip, road trip, or camping trip! 

 Our super convenient 2 in 1 backpack gives you the convenience of carrying your food and drinks on your back with your other essentials, freeing up your hands and liberating you from bulky, burdensome coolers. 

 Our Cooler Backpack features: 

 -4 easy access zippered backpack compartments: 

 Water resistant cooler compartment lined with top-quality insulation 

 *  Main center compartment 
 *  Separate computer compartment 

 Smaller compartment with pockets for your cell phone, keys, pens, credit cards & travel wallet 

 -2 mesh drink holder pockets 

 -Heat sealed seams 

 -Padded adjustable straps 

 -Breathable mesh back padding 

 -Quick grab top handle 

 Dimensions: 20x13x9 

 Make outings a breeze! Our goal is to provide a backpack that will keep up with you and your adventures and eliminate the need for clumsy coolers that weigh you down. We guarantee that our heat seal bags will keep your food fresh and cold for the whole trip, or your money back. If it doesn’t, simply contact us directly & then return the camping backpack ice chest bag to us within 90 days for a full refund!
feature_bullets: ★ WATER RESISTANT, LIGHTWEIGHT and PERFECT FOR ALL OCCASIONS; The North Coyote Cooler Backpack with HEAT-SEALED SEAMS guarantees the best outdoor experience! You can carry your backpack with confidence and focus on having fun, without the worry! The perfect hiking daypack, fishing backpack, camping cooler for beer & soda, and lunch cooler bag for road trips. ❗❗PLEASE USE ICE-COOLERS INSTEAD OF DIRECTLY ADDING ICE INTO THE COOLER DEPARTMENT❗❗

★ WHILE MANY SO-CALLED INSULATED COOLER BAGS ARE NOT WELL-INSULATED AT ALL, melting your ice pack within a couple of hours and NOT KEEPING YOUR FOOD & DRINKS COOL FOR LONG, our Cooler Backpack features a WATER RESISTANT COOLER COMPARTMENT lined with the HIGHEST QUALITY FOAM INSULATION, so your food and beverages STAY COLD AND FRESH FOR HOURS.

★ We’ve heard so many stories about other LOW QUALITY BACKPACK BRANDS RIPPING APART AFTER JUST A COUPLE OF WEEKS and ZIPPERS SNAGGING & BREAKING that we made absolutely sure we used the HIGHEST QUALITY DURABLE MATERIALS for our tear resistant backpack – including the SMOOTHEST ZIPPERS WE COULD FIND. Features breathable mesh back padding & adjustable padded straps for extra comfort and a quick grab handle for versatile transportation.

★ WHY LUG A CUMBERSOME COOLER AROUND WHEN YOU CAN CARRY IT EASILY ON YOUR BACK, HANDS FREE? Enjoy the convenience and luxury of a BACKPACK & SOFT COOLER IN ONE, freeing up your hands to round up the kids and carry your other essentials. Our large bag cooler has 2 MESH WATER BOTTLE HOLDER POCKETS & 4 EASY ACCESS ZIPPER COMPARTMENTS, including a separate LAPTOP COMPARTMENT and a smaller compartment with POCKETS FOR YOUR CELL PHONE, KEYS, PENS & CREDIT CARDS.

★ MAKE OUTINGS A BREEZE! Our goal is to provide a backpack that will KEEP UP WITH YOU & YOUR ADVENTURES and eliminate the need for clumsy coolers that weigh you down. We guarantee that our 4 compartment insulated cooler bag will KEEP YOUR FOOD FRESH & COLD for the whole trip, or your money back. If it doesn’t, simply contact us directly & then return the insulated bag to us WITHIN 90 DAYS FOR A FULL REFUND!
